alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:01PM EST until January 12 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EST FOR NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LEON AND SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS COUNTIES... At 700 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boston, or 11 miles southeast of Thomasville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Fincher, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Enon, Everett, Patten, Eason, Miccosukee, Jarrott, Newark, Metcalf, Hollis, and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
